name: Sausage Potato Stuff
author: summergale11
summary: My Mom would make this for us all the time. Now I make it for my family! It is so easy and delicious! Very hard to mess up. If you'd rather bake it in the oven, put potatoes, sausage, and green chiles in a 9x13-inch glass dish and proceed with instructions.
ingredients: 2 large russet potatoes, peeled and cut into 1-inch cubes
1 (14 ounce) beef smoked sausage (such as Hillshire Farms®), cut into 1/2-inch slices
directions: Heat olive oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat
Cook and stir potatoes and sausage in hot oil until the potatoes are tender, 7 to 10 minutes
Stir green chiles into the potato mixture; cook and stir another 5 minutes
Remove skillet from heat and sprinkle Cheddar cheese over the potato mixture
Place lid on the skillet and set aside until the cheese melts, 3 to 5 minutes
